title: Day 1 - Blessed Carlo Acutis Novena
content:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Father in Heaven, I give you thanks for the graces and devotion that You gave to Blessed Carlo Acutis. Through the merits of this Angel of Youth, grant me the grace which I earnestly seek (mention request here…). Amen. Blessed Carlo, you made the Holy Eucharist the focus of your life and devoted yourself to God in our modern times. You engaged in the world but did not attach yourself to it. Through your prayers obtain for me the graces from God to do the same, to be faithful always and lead others to Christ and His Holy Catholic Church. I ask this through Christ our Lord. Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father
Hail Mary
Glory Be
Blessed Carlo Acutis, pray for us!
